text: 9|114|Iburahimu ga jibun no chichi no tame ni, o yurushi o motomete inotta no wa, tada kare (chichi) to yakusoku ga atta tamedearu. Sore de kare (chichi) ga arra no tekidearu koto ga meihaku ni natta toki, kare (chichi) to no kankei o kotowatta. Hontoni iburahimu wa, nyuwade shinbodzuyoi jinbutsudeatta.
